entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Disable navigation interception if the interactive router gets removed from the page #50069
  • .NET 8.0.0-preview.7 Blazor Web Template Get Stuck in Loading with Kestrel #50066
  • Investigate performance of Antiforgery #50065
  • Update how IFormOptionsMetadata maps to FormOptions #50062
    8.0-rc2
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #50061
  • Timers in Blazor WebAssembly halt at specific times #50060
  • Blazor WASM: certain startup errors don't trigger error pop-up in the UI #50058
  • API review: Components rendermodes #50057
    8.0-rc1
  • Method for specifying transfer-encoding in Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi #50056
  • Inconsistency behaviour between `app.UseExceptionHandler()` and `app.UseExceptionHandler(_=> { })` #50049
  • Log a warning if event callbacks are registered on non-interactive components #50047
    .NET 9 Planning

Closed

  • MapIdentityApi HTTP endpoints #50009
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer 7.0.8 introduces error #49064
    8.0-rc2
  • "Adding `@ref` to a RenderFragment in C# - Seeking Guidance" #49839
    Discussions
  • query parameter does not work correctly in net 8 preview 7 under native aot #50048
    8.0-rc1
  • Perf improvement: caching #50044
  • RemoteAuthenticationHandler.Options.CallbackPath does not match Request.Path (redirect_uri) with Blazor deployed on Nginx #50036
  • Clicking on the link couse showing blank page. To show page is need to refresh. #50050
  • Blazor Web App Template - website after publish to local IIS fails to load #50032
  • CascadingValueSource doesn't work with named AddCascadingValue #50034
  • Extend Quickgrid with custom attributes such as 'style' #45327
    8.0-rc1
  • Blazor-Server bypassing form (model) validations. #49319
    8.0-rc2
  • An existing connection was forcibly closed by remote host on AppShell #50033
  • Blazor: IJSObjectReference does not seem to support js min files? #49003
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #50045
  • WebApplication.RunAsync does not accept a cancellation token #44083
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add EditContext.IsValid(..) to determine if a field has any associated validation messages. #31252
    8.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Add APIs for "enhanced refresh" #50068
    area-blazor

Merged

  • React to MapIdentityApi HTTP endpoints API review feedback #50067
    area-identity, 8.0-rc1
  • Add warning if user changes during Stateful Reconnect #50059
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc1
  • Add buffer limit option for SignalR Stateful Reconnect #49978
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc1
  • [RDG] Account of parameter name in signature comparison #50064
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc1
  • Add benchmarking documentation #50027
    Docs, needs-area-label, 8.0-rc1
  • Set form options for form-based request types #50016
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc1
  • Pass through arbitrary attributes to QuickGrid #50051
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • Reduce RendererSynchronizationContext overheads #48720
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1
  • Update debugger display to use a consistent format #49898
    area-mvc, 8.0-rc1
  • Add EditContext.IsValid(..) to determine if a field has any associated validation messages #48698
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • [SignalR][TS client] Stateful reconnect #49940
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2243047 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor
  • Change AddServerSideBlazor to call services.AddRazorComponents().AddServerComponents() #49106
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
